channel.title: Obama
channel.description:
I am writing this topic because seems as I look around the internet people still seem to think Obama is the best president in the world as 99% of the country still struggles.
I am going to be showing you articles from various websites on his spending's compared to other Presidents who were before him.
Let's start off with this graph. It shows President George W. Bush vs. President Barack Obama
[img]http://biggovernment.com/files/2011/07/01deb77c-7712-4915-bf53-d0897f62a99e.jpg[/img]
You can see, compared to President Bush's 8 years he managed to spend $3,700,000,000,000.00 less then President Obama's 4 year term. And people want him to be President again!?!
Here is something interesting I found, showing Michelle Obama (Presidents wife) spending $10,000,000.00 in taxpayer money to go on Vacations. This year she has taken 42 days on vacation time. That is roughly 1 day of vacation every 9 days. This isn't "Days off" This is actual vacation. [url=http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2029615/Michelle-Obama-accused-spending-10m-public-money-vacations.html]Read Here[/url]
Let's talk about unemployment. How many of you have had a job and/or looking for a job now? I am, I was laid off of work due to lack of work. No money = no work. No work = no money to spend. No money to spend = businesses closing.
Here is a graph showing the unemployment rate from the last 10 years. [img]http://www.forecast-chart.com/images/chart-monthly/unemployment-rate-january.gif[/img]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4Gbx8PjwP6s[/youtube]
Now we are about to go to war with a 3rd world country. Iran. I for 1 do not want to go to war with Iran. Iran can't necessarily defend itself. If we go to war I guarantee we will end up just taking over the country. Our country is just a bully. I hate bullies. Obama is the main cause for us heading into all this crap. He is sticking his nose into other people's business. Because Iran and Israel have been building more tension and Israel is United States Ally. But we need to think about this logically before we go to war. Going into another war losing thousands of men, trillions of dollars is not going to benefit anybody. Not Iran, not America. Us going to war is going to completely destroy the economy, causing the whole world's economy to crash.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=41GyYGJgQ4E[/youtube]

Btw they promote Ron Paul, not saying I agree with all of it but they make some pretty decent points. Don’t listen to the black DJ who believes everyone is invading Africa for nutrients, he;s retarded.

item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:23, topic:431853”][quote author=n10si t link=topic=534561.msg3908505#msg3908505 date=1328465793]

[quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=534561.msg3908500#msg3908500 date=1328465636]

lOL @ steve erkle or whatever his name is

I’d vote Clinton back in any day.
[/quote]Although Clinton was republican, I have to agree with you on that. We was a fine president.

i’ve had enough of your shit. I know damn well you don’t remember a fucking thing about clinton. we’re the same age and i don’t even remember him being president. bush came into office when we were 4-5.

and he was a democrat. you fucking imbecile.
[/quote]Who was that directed at ? :|[/quote]

not you

RiiPiiNFtW:

I acidently put republican. It was directed at me. I actually have been in multiple political science classes and am currrently in AP Polisci. I also shook Clinton’s hand when I was at Disney Land. So HA!

you’re in ap polisci and you don’t know what party clinton was in? okay

you’re 15 years old and been in multiple political science classes? okay

shaking someones hand doesnt mean shit, you idiot. you were a little kid when he was president. you don’t know jack shit about people who actually had responsibilities when he was president and how their lives were. so shut up

item.title: Obama
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Ron Paul would like to legalize every drug if he could.

@Everyone Don’t give me that crap about “It was Bush’s fault! Obama was trying to clean up!” How can you screw up even more then the last guy. Unemployment rate has nearly doubled, and they keep talking about “It’s getting better, the unemployment rate is dropping.” No it isn’t. The rate is dropping because people have ran out of time to find a job so the money stops coming to them. No I don’t blame Obama for me losing my job, and I wasn’t “fired” I was legit laid off, I go back to work at the end of this month.

Now, I am surprised nobody is talking about the most current event which is now becoming the war in Iran. I posted that video of Obama saying that Iran was not a threat to our country and their defense system was 1/100 of ours. Going to war with them would effect us tremendously with the gas prices seeing that they hold the #3 most oil supply in the world. That will just give the Oil companies reason to charge everyone $5.00 a gallon on Gasoline. Not to mention it is stupid we are going to war with them in the first place.

Read full topic
